params._bid: The loan bid struct to get the owed amount for.
params._paymentCycleType: The payment cycle type of the loan (Seconds or Monthly).
params._timestamp: The timestamp at which to get the owed amount at.

params._apr: The annual percentage rate of the loan.
params._cycleType: The cycle type set for the loan. (Seconds or Monthly)
params._paymentCycle: The length of the loan's payment cycle.
params._principal: The starting amount that is owed on the loan.
params._type: The payment type of the loan.

calculateAmountOwed(Bid storage,uint256,.notice: Calculates the amount owed for a loan.

calculatePaymentCycleAmount(PaymentType,.notice: Calculates the amount owed for a loan for the next payment cycle.
